tool_description: grab all upcoming events at AAC Dallas
title: American Airlines Dallas API

api_list.name: generate10httprequest
api_list.description:
uses puppeteer to force click 'load more events' button on aac dallas website and captures 10 https request.

next step extract event info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://american-airlines-dallas-api.p.rapidapi.com/next10httprequests"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-airlines-dallas-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: welcome page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://american-airlines-dallas-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-airlines-dallas-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
